title: Introduction to C Programming
details: This course provides an introduction to the fundamentals of C programming. You'll learn the basics of programming in C, including data types, control structures, functions, and more.

title: Introduction to Algorithms
details: Explore the world of algorithms in this course. You'll study various algorithms and data structures, algorithm analysis, and problem-solving techniques.

title: Introduction to C++ for DSA
details: This course introduces you to C++ programming with a focus on Data Structures and Algorithms (DSA). You'll learn how to implement common DSA concepts in C++.

title: Basic Data Structures
details: Delve into the fundamentals of data structures. You'll study arrays, linked lists, stacks, queues, and trees, and understand how to use them to solve problems.

title: Introduction to CQP Python
details: Learn the basics of Python programming with a focus on scientific computing, data analysis, and visualization using CQP (Cython, Numpy, and Matplotlib).

title: Software Engineering
details: Discover the principles and practices of software engineering. You'll cover software development methodologies, design patterns, and more.

title: AWS, Cloud Computing
details: Explore Amazon Web Services (AWS) and cloud computing concepts. This course covers AWS services, infrastructure as code, and cloud architecture.

title: Database (MySQL)
details: Learn about database management using MySQL. Topics include SQL queries, database design, and practical database administration.

title: Problem-Solving Part
details: This course focuses on enhancing your problem-solving skills. You'll tackle a variety of algorithmic problems and develop effective problem-solving strategies.
